name: simple-gmail-ai
description: Gmail AI Support Triage & Auto-Reply Add-on using Gemini 2.5 Flash

scripts.create: clasp create --title 'Gmail AI Support Triage' --type addon --rootDir ./dist
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm-run-all --parallel bundle copy-files sync-readme
scripts.test:e2e: echo 'E2E tests require manual verification in Gmail - see test-integration.gs'
scripts.predeploy: npm-run-all check build test && echo 'Pre-deploy checks passed'
scripts.deploy: npm run predeploy && git add -A && git diff --staged --quiet || git commit -m 'chore: prepare for deployment' && npm version minor && ./deploy.sh && echo 'Deployment complete'
scripts.deploy:major: npm run predeploy && npm version major && ./deploy.sh && echo 'Major version deployment complete'

author: Franz Enzenhofer
